text: @realDonaldTrump This is the most ridiculous thing you have come up with yet. With COVID-19 weather issues and the lack of polling places and people who want to work the polls there is no option that you have mail in voting. By the way nice choice of the voter fraud chairman. 🤮 https://t.co/X9mTtEDJGg
